## 4. Analysis - Cycle 1

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

country_metrics<-read_csv("../cache/country_metrics_cycle1.csv")

country_metrics %>%
  slice_max(avg_steps_completed, n=5)%>%
  ggplot(aes(
    x = reorder(country,avg_steps_completed),
    y = avg_steps_completed
))+
geom_col()+
coord_flip()+
labs(
  title = "Top 5 countries by average steps completed",
  x = "Country",
  y = "Average Steps Completed"
)
```
